text: The 2006 IPC Cycling World Championships were the 2nd World Championships for track and road cycling for athletes with a physical disability. The Championships took place in Aigle, Switzerland from 11–18 September 2006, with track events on the first three days of competition, time trials on days 4 and 5, and road races on days 6 and 7. Organised by the International Paralympic Committee, the event was the forerunner of the UCI organized Para-cycling Track and Road Championships, and the last to be organized by IPC Cycling; UCI took over the running of the event in 2007. 24 events were held on the track, while 34 events were held on the road. ==Medal table== ==Track events== {| |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=8 | Men's events |- |rowspan=2|Sprint | B & VI | colspan=2| | colspan=2| | colspan=2| |- | Team Sprint | colspan=2| Guenter Brechtel Mario Hammer Pierre Senska | colspan=2| Javier Ochoa Roberto Alcalde Amador Granado | colspan=2| Jaco Nel Stephan Herholdt Janos Plekker |- |colspan=8 | |- |rowspan=7|Kilo time trial 2016 Aigle - UCI Paracycling - Day 1, from Cyclingnews.com | CP4 | || 1:10 | || + 0:00.1 | ||+ 0:02 |- | CP3 | || 1:13 | ||+0:04 | ||+0:08 |- | B & VI | || 1:04 | || +0:01 | || +0:01 |- | LC4 2016 Aigle - UCI Paracycling - Day 2, from Cyclingnews.com | || 1:23 | ||+ 0:03 | || +0:04 |- | LC3 | ||1:20 | ||+0:00 | || +0:01 |- | LC2 | || 1:11 | || +0:01 | || +0:01 |- | LC1 | || 1:09 WR | || +0:01 | || +0:01 |- |colspan=8 | |- |rowspan=7|Individual Pursuit | CP4 | || 3:37 | ||+ 0:07 | || + 0:10 |- | CP3 | || 3:45 | ||+0:02 | ||+0:18 |- | B & VI | || 4:32 | || +0:05 | || +0:01* Bronze final |- | LC4 | colspan=2| | colspan=2| | colspan=2| |- | LC3 | colspan=2| | colspan=2| | colspan=2| |- | LC2 | colspan=2| | colspan=2| | colspan=2| |- | LC1 | colspan=2| | colspan=2| | colspan=2| |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=8 | Women's events |- |colspan=8 | |- |rowspan=5|time trial | LC3-4, CP3 - 2 lap | || 27.18 | || + 0.51 | ||+ 1.48 |- | LC3 2016 Aigle - UCI Paracycling - Day 3 | || 45.00 | || + 0:01 | ||+ 0:02 |- | LC2 | || 42.00 | || + 0:01 | ||+ 0:01 |- | LC1 | || 0:38 | || + 0:01 | ||+ 0:02 |- | B&VI;
